products.title: Palate Lace White Roller Blind
products.description: The palate lace white is one of the whitest fabrics in their blackout roller blind range. Suitable for neutral environments or locations that need a bit of purity. Being a blackout blind makes this is perfect for bedrooms to get a great nights sleep without the worry if light seeping through the fabric. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Day & Night Flecked White
products.description: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other.

products.title: Day & Night Effortless White
products.description: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, their day & night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other.

products.title: Faro White Vertical Blind
products.description: The faro white vertical blind featuring its modern pattern with textured streaks, the slight contrast in texture makes this blind an aesthetically pleasing choice. The crisp white colour of this blind makes it both versatile and stylish, if this sounds good to you, this blind might just be perfect for your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Burst Snowfall Roller Blind
products.description: Cool and crisp, the splash frost is like a clear winter's morning without a cloud in the sky. The true beauty of this slightly thinner dimout blind is that in direct sunlight it will glow with a gentle intensity that soothes the soul and gives the entire room a slightly heavenly vibe. Perfect for neutral tone bedrooms, when the sun rises and illuminates the fabric you will wake up feeling at peace and to the sound of harps.

products.title: Burst White Lotus Roller Blind
products.description: Add some serenity to your home with the pure white of the burst white lotus roller blind. This blind will gently filter the light entering through your window, helpfully stopping any glare pestering you whilst you try to watch tv. These blinds are a dimout material so will gently filter the light making them ideal for living rooms, kitchens and bathrooms. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric.

products.title: Sugar White Aluminium Venetian
products.description: The soft white colour of the sugar white aluminium venetian blind is perfect for those who don't want a bright, glossy white slat in their window, but are after something less stark and a little bit warmer. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: Warm White Aluminium Venetian
products.description: Aluminium venetian blinds are perfect for controling the light coming into your home, along with adding privacy and a stylish finish to your window. In a range of colours, these blinds are perfect for any decor. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: White Gloss Aluminium Venetian
products.description: When you need a bright white blind look no further than the gloss white. This is a pure and simple blind, but will give your room a crisp and fresh look to it. products.title: Chalk Dust Aluminium Venetian
products.description: The light grey colour in this blind is anything but boring. Greys get overlooked as a colour but we think that when placed in the right environment this colour can really shine. This lighter toned grey will fit alongside many decor styles and gives a clean and sophisticated look to your room. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: White Perfora Aluminium Venetian
products.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. products.title: Robin N' Frost Roller Blind
products.description: The icy blue colour of the robin n frost roller is perfect for adding a cooler tone to your room - with the icy blue backing and the white print overlaying it makes this blind unique and cool - in more ways than one. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 280cm wide - much wider than most paterned roller blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Speciality White Crane Roller Blind
products.description: A strong and bold pattern, the speciality white crane is great for decor's that require a bold repeating pattern that won't dominate the room because of its colour. The blue and white contrast is perfect for rooms across your home, and you can choose this blind to come as either a dimout, blackout or waterproof fabric. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

One of their best-selling roller blinds, the clean hue has a contemporary feel that pairs well with simplistic interiors. The blackout material blind is fully impenetrable to light, perfect for comprehensive shading bedrooms and overexposed areas of your home. products.title: Gibson Perfect White Roller Blind
products.description: The gibson perfect white is a beautiful blind that gives a bright and airy feel even when closed. A solid colour fabric, it works brilliantly in smaller rooms as the pale colouration visually extends the space. Designed to suit damp conditions, the blind's hardwearing fabric is wipe-clean and fire retardant, so it can work in tricky spaces such as bathrooms and kitchens. Choose to have controls on either the left or right according to what best suits your layout.

products.title: Gibson White Dove Roller Blind
products.description: The gibson white dove is a light beige coloured roller blind, use this with brighter colourful decors. Don't pair it with magnolia - otherwise, you might night know where the walls start and the blind ends. This blind is however, brilliant for a bathroom. The fabric is 100% waterproof, making it ideal for placing in a hot, steamy bathroom. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues.

products.title: Ritz Bright White Vertical Blind
products.description: This vertical blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. products.title: Fuji Silk Snow Roller Blind

This blind is very versatile and can be paired in many different ways to create a modern, sophisticated interior. products.title: White Blackout Blind For Velux  Skylights
products.description: Some would say that this blind is too white. Those people are wrong. Being such a sharp white can only be a good thing, as it allows this blind to work like a dream in those crisp, monochromatic schemes that are so popular in homes around the country.

products.title: Amor White Lotus With Haze Pure Double Roller Blind
products.description: Combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor white lotus and haze pure double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy, then at night lower the blackout amor soft grey to block out the light. Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice.

products.title: Ritz Bright White Roller Blind
products.description: This blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Day & Night Woven Pure
products.description: The day & night woven pure roller blind features a light white colour that's both versatile and practical. The premium texture also helps to make this blind a stylish choice. Combining brilliant light control with an aesthetic design, its a charming addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind.

products.title: Snow White Honeycomb Dimout Perfect Fit
products.description: The gorgeous pleated snow white honeycomb dimout perfect fit blind is simple, stylish and versatile. Its elegant white can be paired in an endless amount of ways, to add a modern, classy feel to its paired window. You simply cant go wrong with a clean, crisp white blind struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated perfect fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time.

products.title: Belmont Vanilla Roller Blind
products.description: The belmont vanilla roller blind is a brilliant way to spice up your window frame, with its change in blind texture and subtle stripes, this gentle cream coloured roller blind will really enhance your window without demanding the centre of attention. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Haze Pure Voile Roller Blind
products.description: The haze pure voile blind is a white sheer blind with a soft texture to it, this is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Voile blinds, also known as sheer blinds, are a great way to give your home privacy whilst still letting the daylight in.

products.title: Pura White Voile Roller Blind
products.description: The pura white voile blind has a soft uniform weave to it, and is one of the purest white sheer blind we offer in their range. With a soft texture to it, this is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Vassal Frost Pleated Perfect Fit
products.description: Vassal frost is a crisp white with a delicate tint, for a clean and bright blind that has a calmness and purity about it. Matching beautifully with its white upvc frame, the innovative perfect fit system clips in direct to your window for a tools-free, fuss-free fit. The dimout style allows a gentle scatter of light to filter through even when the blind is closed, to enable both light and privacy together, making this an ideal choice for 'daytime' rooms such sunrooms and living rooms.

products.description: Combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor white lotus and haze soft grey double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy, then at night lower the blackout amor soft grey to block out the light.
